dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4523 IH: To make technical amendments to title 49, United States Code, as necessary to improve the Code.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Onder introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To make technical amendments to title 49, United States Code, as necessary to improve the Code.

section.text: The table of contents for this Act is as follows:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 3. Technical amendments to chapter 224 of title 49, United States Code.

section.text: The purpose of this Act is to make technical amendments to title 49, United States Code, as necessary to improve the Code.

section.header: TECHNICAL AMENDmeNTS to chapter 224 of title 49, united states code

subsection.text: Section 22401 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking (A) The term and inserting the following:
The term
in subparagraph (B)—

clause.text: by redesignating clauses (i), (ii), and (iii) as subclauses (I), (II), and (III);
by striking (B) The cost and inserting the following:
by striking Calculation of the cost of a direct loan and inserting:
Calculation of the cost of a direct loan

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (C)—

clause.text: by redesignating clauses (i) and (ii) as subclauses (I) and (II);
by striking (C) The cost and inserting the following:
by striking Calculation of the cost of a loan guarantee and inserting the following:
Calculation of the cost of a loan guarantee

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking (D) The cost and inserting the following:
The cost
in subparagraph (E), by striking (E) In estimating and inserting the following:
In estimating
in subparagraph (F), by striking (F) When funds and inserting the following:
When funds

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting (2 U.S.C. 900(c)(9)) after Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985; and
in paragraph (12)—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting of this title after section 20102; and
in subparagraph (B), by inserting of this title after section 24102.

subsection.text: Section 22402 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(3), by striking government sponsored and inserting government-sponsored;
in subsection (c)(1), by inserting of this title after section 20157(i);
in subsection (f)—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting (2 U.S.C. 661c(b)(1)) after section 504(b)(1) of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990;
in paragraph (5)—

subclause.text: by inserting of this title after section 22406(a)(2);
by striking (Public Law 114–94) and inserting (Public Law 114–94, 129 Stat. 1312); and
by striking (Public Law 94–210) and inserting (Public Law 94–210, 90 Stat. 31); and

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting (Public Law 117–58, div. B, 135 Stat. 652) after Surface Transportation Investment Act of 2021; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (7), by inserting (Public Law 117–58, div. B, 135 Stat. 652) after Surface Transportation Investment Act of 2021;

paragraph.text: in subsection (g)(1)(C)(ii)(II), by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon;
in subsection (h)(3)—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A)—

clause.text: by inserting of this title after section 24312; and
by inserting of this title after section 24308(a); and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by inserting of this title after section 22404; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (i)—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3)(B), by striking the heading Actions by the Office of Management and Budget and inserting the heading Actions by the office of management and budget;
in paragraph (4)(A)—

clause.text: by inserting (Public Law 117–58, div. B, 135 Stat. 652) after Surface Transportation Investment Act of 2021; and
by striking an streamlined and inserting a streamlined; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (6)(A)—

clause.text: in clause (iv), by striking refinancing an and inserting refinancing of an; and
in clause (ix), by inserting of this title after section 5323(j).

subsection.header: Administration of Direct Loans and Loan guarantees
subsection.text: Section 22403 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by inserting of this title after section 22402;
in subsection (b), by inserting of this title after section 22402;
in subsection (c), by inserting of this title after section 22402;
in subsection (d)(3), by inserting of this title after section 22402(f);
in subsection (g), in the matter before paragraph (1), by inserting of this title after section 22402;
in subsection (h)(1), by inserting of this title after section 22402;
in subsection (i)—

subparagraph.text: in the matter before paragraph (1), by inserting of this title after section 22402 each place it appears; and
in paragraph (1), by striking of this section; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (m), by inserting of this title after section 22402.

subsection.text: Section 22405(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by inserting of this title after section 22402.
Section 22406 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking the period at the end;
in subsection (a)(2), by inserting of this title after section 22402(f)(5); and
in subsection (b)(2), by inserting of this title after section 22403(l)(1).

subsection.header: National Surface Transportation and Innovative Finance Bureau
subsection.text: Section 116(d)(1)(B) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by inserting of this title after sections 22401 through 22403.

Section 21303(1) of the Surface Transportation Investment Act of 2021 (49 U.S.C. 22402 note) is amended by striking section 22402(b)(1)(E) of title 49 and inserting section 22402(b)(1)(F) of title 49.
Section 22905(c)(2)(B) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by inserting of this title after section 22404.
